compatibility.notes: AGPL-1.0 is a copyleft license that requires derivative works to be distributed under the same terms, making it incompatible with permissive licenses like MIT or Apache-2.0. When distributing a modified version of AGPL-1.0 software, you must also distribute your modifications and the source code.

key_requirements: The recipient must comply with the obligations above
The recipient must preserve the original authorship and the license terms
The recipient must make modifications available under the same license
license.name: AGPL-1.0
obligations: Distribute derivative works under the same license
Provide the source code for modified versions
Include a copy of this license in the distribution
Give recipients all the rights that you have to distribute copies
Make sure that they, too, receive or can get the source code
